name: Employee Review System
desc: This Employee review web application is created for employees to submit feedback toward each other's performance.

name: Issue Tracker
desc: User can Create a new project Check the details of the project Create a new issue for the bug present in the project Filter the issues

name: Polling API
desc: Create an API where anyone can create questions with options and also add votes to it

name: ToDo App
desc: It is a simple TODO application using NodeJS and MongDB. where a user of this application can create,edit and delete all the ToDo items.

name: Social Media
desc: Develop a RESTful API for handling social media data, including posts, comments, and user profiles.

name: MERN Chat App
desc: Chat App is a MERN Stack Chatting App. Uses Socket.io for real time communication and stores user details in encrypted format in Mongo DB Database.

name: Habit Tracker
desc: React app to start tracking habits for next seven days. we can add, delete and change status of each habit for a day.

name: React ToDoApp
desc: Build a CRUD application with React and Redux. Use Redux toolkit to build this todo app with cool animations using framer-motion.

name: Buy Busy
desc: This is an online shopping / eCommerce website made using Reactjs, firebase database for storing data on cloud and ContextAPI for store state and creating functions.

name: I-Pod
desc: This is a Mini Ipod App Project which is built using React, CSS, Javascript. It is responsive across all devices.

name: IMDB Clone
desc: A mini IMDB clone app in which we can search movies based on OMDB API, with search suggestions. Clicking on a particular movie card opens a new movie page for more info. On clicking on the favourite button, we can add a movie to the favourite list which is using local storage to store movies.

name: ToDo List
desc: This is a simple Todo app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Sales Dasboard
desc: This project is a React-based sales dashboard application that visualizes sales data using charts and tables. It features two main dashboards: Today's Sales and Sales Comparison.

name: Movie WatchList
desc: The Movie Watchlist application is a web-based tool that allows users to manage a list of movies they want to watch. Users can add, edit, and delete movies from their watchlist, mark movies as watched or unwatched, and rate and review movies. State management will be handled using Redux to ensure efficient and predictable state updates.

name: Bharat Bridal Week
desc: This is Bharat Bridal Week Project made using Reactjs, TailwindCSS

name: Goa Resort Week
desc: This is Goa Resort Week Project made using Reactjs, TailwindCSS

name: Wishy Washy
desc: This is Wishy Washy Project made using Reactjs, TailwindCSS

name: Finmap
desc: This is Finmap Project made using Reactjs, TailwindCSS

name: Imeleo NextJs
desc: This is Imeleo NextJs Project made using Reactjs, NextJs, TypeScript, TailwindCSS

name: MERN TODO
desc: This is a Todo App built with React.js for the frontend, Node.js and Express for the backend, and PostgreSQL for the database.

name: Educational Learning Opportunities Landing Page
desc: This is Educational Learning Opportunities Landing Page Project made using Reactjs, TailwindCSS

name: College Finder
desc: The College Finder Web App simplifies the college search process for students and parents. It offers detailed information on colleges, including rankings, placement stats, user ratings, and more. Find the perfect college based on course, location, fees, and other criteria.

name: Pizza Store
desc: Created an application which simulates a pizza restaurant behavior. From taking orders to making the order ready.
